Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Tjanebesu with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief holding a hoe, an adze and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the legs are inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in six rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
